name: Side Trak
description:
Side Trak is a 2D plat-former game about S.B(Scatter Brain) and his Journey through a place he doesn't know. Jump through challenging landscape and keep a level head on top of you.  While listening to some nice tunes, how long does it take for you to get annoyed?

  • Pixel Art
  • Fast Game play
  • Chill Music

Game by Caleb Fepuleai

Music by Christopher Valenzuela: https://soundcloud.com/user-387913682
